case.state: Whoa! Timeout! Where am I? Is this another world...?
Uh... hello?
(~Name~ seems... suspicious. I should keep an eye out.)
Poker...? Uh, sure. I know what that is. I think.
Card games? I've played some with my sisters before, so that sounds alright.
I'm standing firm! No cards!
No cards here! I'm full!
Alright, dealer! Hit me with ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~!
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~, dealer.
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ oughta do it.
I have no idea what I'm doing.
Hey. Pst. Dealer. Is this a good hand?
Why do all the people on the cards have to look so smug?
Come on! Someone is getting naked, and it's not going to be me this time!
These cards don't feel like paper... are they plastic? Do you guys have that here, too?
Man. Not wearing pants is awesome.
I should fight in the nude more often. You get so much freedom of motion like this!
I think I'm about to lose.
So, how are you all? Feeling good?
Okay, now I want to change these... what do you mean I can't?
So, when do the monsters come out and interrupt the game? Any moment now, right?
Which of these cards have better stats?
Do I have a passive that'd help with card games...?
This is the greatest set of cards I have ever seen! I'm sure of it!
(Should I just tell them I've been winging it all this time?)
I like these cards. They're very... rectangular?
Nothing like a cool breeze on your skin.
If I just believe in my cards, I'll win! Right?
I bet I'm playing better now that I'm naked. It's more natural like this.
(I have no idea how to play poker.)
I get the feeling this isn't good.
Am I meant to have more red cards or black ones?
Poker is this easy, huh?
Hah! I'm getting the hang of this game now!
...Huh?
Big numbers are a good thing, right? They're usually a good thing.
Maybe I should wear shorts...
Ouch. That stings.
Something feels off about these cards.
That's not great. Terrible, actually.
You're not... envious of girls with bigger chests, are you? I don't think you should be.
So, you're saying that there's more of you, in a way? Great!
Depends on if you're against one enemy or several, but you'll want to save up SP for the really strong attacks, anyway. Just normal attacks will do until they're ready.
Well, the Poppins make all kinds of robots, like that sex robot they designed for seeing girls' o-faces...
Well... We were supposed to start looking for clues, to see if a part of Adan exists in this world. But I should probably find my wives, first.
Yes! Yes, it is! It's a great thing!
Yeah, we totally can. They're cute.
Boobs are good, but so are butts! You have just the right amount of both to be yourself!
Explore ruins... {loud}I know exactly what you mean, and I'd love to!{!reset}
I kind of respect what Adan did, and how he sacrificed himself trying to save humanity, even with how he ended up...
Probably Adan's death, but I guess you could say everything that led up to it is more important, in a way.
Outrageous theories...? I mean, I know the world was made by Mother Eve, but Riche has mentioned some crazy stuff about aliens before.
Pretty much every story about Mother Eve is actually kind of sexy. Kath said the evenicle reads more like porn than scripture.
I don't know if it counts, but it's like all of Eve's ruins still have her aura because she got horny, or something. Maybe it's the same for all of the holy relics, too...
Pilot... that's probably too much for me, but I think Kath would like a job like that.
Oh, yeah, shopping can be fun. I usually go buy food and stuff with my wives.
Just... one thing? Probably... Aw, I can't pick between them all... they're all too pretty.
Does... porn count? I don't really read anything else.

Well, Adan was the first human, but now he's... evil, and the source of all the monsters in the world. It gets complicated.
And yeah! I have ten wives!
Huh... so they're like slime hannies, but charge your SP... That sounds super useful!
Adan was the first human... But after he took in all of humanity's sin, he kind of blew up, apparently, and split the world apart.
Ahh... Mostly magazines and comics and stuff. Ramius and I like to read them together.
I don't know what a Pokémon is, but if it's edible, it's edible, isn't it?
Oh, yeah. These are the clothes I had on me when I swam to the continent. I've tried other armors, but this is the outfit that stuck.
A... duck? Is that some kind of insect?
I was suspicious of you already, and that just makes it worse.
Hah. Yeah, I think we might need a family game night like this... if I could convince them.
I have never felt such kinship with a machine before. Thank you for that, Wheatley!
I'll tag along if there are girls coming, too. Shopping on my own or with another guy isn't the same.

state.text: That sucks. Need me to lend you som- {loud}I just realized, all my money is with Riche! I have nothing on me!

case.state: Did you say snacks? Teleporting around does make me hungry.
I don't really... hidden? What'd you mean by that, exactly?
Your butt is great, but I prefer boobs... at any size! All boobs are good boobs!
I approve! Piercings are great!
I mean, you still look cute, but... I would never have guessed you're dead.
...Alter Ego? Uh, I don't really get what you are.
(Am I gay now...?)
Those wings are kind of awesome! Kath would kill for technology like that...
If we fuck, we're getting married! So I'd marry all the girls here!
You're sexy... so you're already done!
You're super hot, so you already have me seduced.
I'm not sure that title fits you... I do have some others in my mind, though.
I don't really get that title looking at you... I'm thinking of something else, actually.
Yeah. I've... killed outlaws before. A lot of them. They deserved it, though.
Honestly, I haven't had good luck with mercenary adventurers. Whatever the opposite of Yarase is, I guess.
There was that time Riche put a leash on me and made me go through Leftest with my pants off. But that wasn't so bad in hindsight.
We decided to put off having kids until we settle down from adventuring... but it's surprising nobody's taken you up on the offer.
Married from a card game!? Did he bet his virginity, or something?
I used my dragon powers to teleport here with my family! We... got separated somehow, though.
Yeah, pretty regularly! Usually when I feel in the mood to show my wives some affection.
I guess it depends on who I'm hanging out with. If it's cute girls, I can go forever.
No...? Uh, am I a dick? Because I don't think you are, Tomoko.
Uh... fighting them head-on? That should work.
Stories... must of mine are pretty long... Oh, I could share some of QD's `emptistories', if you'd like.
Yeah! I've been to a bunch of Mother Eve's ruins before... good times. Usually not relic hunting, though.
Uh... no? That sounds like a bad idea.
If the moonlight isn't enough, or we're not fucking during the day, then definitely.
Of course! It's how I first did it with the saints.
I... guess, but lying still feels wrong. Being honest is always better.
There is nothing more important to me than my wives, Jessie!
Actually, we're pretty close to having a million back home, I think. The payout from that golden hanny was awesome.
{loud}I would do it for 24 hours straight!{!reset}
My wives are usually around whenever I have to do that, and they always prefer it if I do it with one of them instead, so...
I kinda like it when the girl gets on top and I can touch her boobs all I want.
What... do you mean by `slept around'?
Huh? Well, I'd... hate it. I want my wives for myself... They wouldn't do that, though.
Every day! If I get the chance. Ramius and I sometimes look at porn together, too.
Maybe? I can't think of any secrets I have.
I guess it depends on the mistake, but I think it's a good thing to forgive people!
I don't like smoke, but I guess it doesn't really care if people do that.
Absolutely! I love my wives more than anything, Ayano!
It depends on how dangerous it is. Going around and seeing all sorts of natural wonders with my family is great.
I don't know what a `Pokéblock' is... But I'll be the best boy I can be for you!
Ah! My rings are gone! This really is another world! At least, I hope that's what it is!
Y'know, this seems surprisingly natural. Maybe because I don't have a leash around my neck this time.
Come to think of it, I saw a comic in Kath's room once that looked like it had this exact plot.
So, this is a game where everyone gets naked, but nobody fucks? Did a Hanny make these rules?
Ramius would have loved this game. She'd have already been naked by now, too.
After all the stuff we had to go through, this seems like a nice change of pace. I hope everyone else is having fun, too.
Ah! Has anyone seen my sword? I think I dropped it when I teleported, and that thing was like 40 thousand gold!
What the hell!? Where are all the girls? Don't tell me there aren't any girls in this world!
I'm the only guy here... surrounded by a bunch of cute girls. I think I'm gonna like this world a lot.
The beach... it reminds me of when I first met Riche. Heh. I woke up, and she was straddling me.
We should probably be careful around here. This place is probably crawling with monsters.
Man. No pairs. I think this might be my worst hand so far.
I hope my wives are alright... How did we end up separated like this?
Is this world another fraction of ours? Would that mean a piece of Adan is here? I wish Riche or Kath were around, I bet they'd know.
Yeah! I have ten wives right now, but I can always rank up to have more.
Actually, I'm a knight, not an adventurer, but... It's awesome! I get to go around, fight monsters and meet tons of cute girls.
Strip? Yeah, I can strip! I can strip better than anyone!
Strip poker? That's... incredible! I'm going all-in, then!
Yes! Time to get serious!
Looks like I get to go now. Great!
Wait, really? I thought those were good!
Oh. Guess that hand wasn't as good as I thought.
Oh no. I lost again. How terrible!
Oh, hey, I get to strip more! Awesome!
Whoa! That's a big step we're taking! You guys sure about this?
Seriously? That far? I mean, if you're sure!
My turn? Let's do this. It's all or nothing, right?
Alright! Let's do this! I'm going all in!
Something broke, because this shouldn't be playing!
Something broke, because this shouldn't be playing!
Something broke, because this shouldn't be playing!
Something broke, because this shouldn't be playing!
Something broke, because this shouldn't be playing!
Something broke, because this shouldn't be playing!
...After I take off my shoes, I mean. That comes first.
I need to take my shoes off first, though. That's a requirement.
I don't have anything special for this jacket. I'll look weird without it, though.
Man. To think this jacket and my sword was all I owned when I left Fresh Fish Island.
Off comes the shirt, then. Who even needs shirts?
It's just a shirt. I don't mind being shirtless
I promised Riche I wouldn't do anything weird if we got separated, and this probably counts...
Showing my dick to a bunch of strangers without my wives knowing might be crazy...
I've practiced this move a lot, and with good reason.

This move has been more useful to me than Attribute Sword.
That's not a high bar, though.
Speed isn't always important. But sometimes it is.
But now I'm all pumped up!
Just wait until I lose next round! You'll see just how serious I can get!

Tada!
I'm not sure how I get rid of them that quickly either. I think my sisters put some kind of curse on me.
Yeah. My pants tend to just... disappear like that. A lot.
But I have no choice! My honor is at stake! Or something!
But I have to do it! As a man, I have no other choice!
How's this? Classy, right?
This isn't too bad. Less skin than I'd show at the beach, anyway.

This is what a knight looks like at level 90!
The same as a knight at level 1, mostly.
Down to my underwear... This is getting risky!
...I'm getting a bad vibe from you, and I don't know why. It's like you... look like a villain, Kazuma.
Wait, I know what you remind me of! There was an outfit that looked a lot like yours in Central.
Are you a knight, too? You're built like one, at least.
Are you a noble or something? The way you talk is even fancier than Riche or Felton...
Seeing guys get naked isn't nearly as fun as seeing girls get naked.
Aw, seriously? ~Name~, you need to play better.
Come on, ~name~! Pull it together! We need to cooperate and get ~fem~ naked, first!
Strip poker? With guys? That's a bit much!
Great idea, ~name~! If we're both naked, ~fem~ will be too distracted to focus on the game!
Shoot. You're still a dude.
My disappointment is immeasurable.
~Name~'s up. Right?
I don't really want to see you strip, but I do like winning!
Aw, man. It's ~name~'s turn?
It's always good to win, right?
Come on, ~name~! Have some gusto!
It's now or never, ~name~! Show the world you're a man!
Moments like these are your chance to prove yourself!
This is your chance to prove yourself!
(Just think about your wives instead, Aster.)
Don't give in yet! You still got a chance, ~name~!
It's not weird if I don't look at you. Definitely not weird.
Guess there's no helping it. ~Name~ has to whip it out.
Ehh. Your turn.
Well, no reason to hold it off, right?
Oh, hey! You share a name with one of my wives, ~player~. What a coincidence!
You remind me of someone, Tomoko. She's also a shut in, and kind of a nerd.
You're kind of scary. I like that.
Come to think of it, you remind me of a knight... no, a dragon from my world. She did a lot of terrible things.
Leonie... right? Eheh. I dig the tomboy look.
Heh. You re a lot more lively than the other ghosts I've met.
Hey, do you ever... possess people for sex?
Is there... a reason for that mask, or...?
You're an `idol'? I can tell you're popular.
(Sure, she's cute... but something about her seems weird.)
Should I... Should I be talking to you, Chell, or the robot...?
...Are you a ghost? You're kind of pale like one.
Huh. You're a bit older than any of my wives...
You're a healer, Angela? Y'know, a party can always have more healers.
Those little ears on top of your head... that's too precious!
Man, being that sexy and mature shouldn't be legal...
Judging by your armor... Are you also a defender, like Ramius?
Wow, you're really short.
Hey, those `Pokémon' you mentioned... what are they?
Oh, wow, you're eager! I'm normally a big fan of that...
I know I can be too horny sometimes, too, and it's not like it can be helped...
You sure seem to like your food, Erufuda. It shows...
It... probably sounds dumb, but I think you should relax a little.
I like your confidence, Miko. It's reassuring, but...
Uh... sorry, could I say something, Tojiko?
Hey, Nami, I want to say something to you!
Wait, I remember now! The thing I was going to say!
You have a very relaxed vibe, Rin...
I don't know what it would be like to... be the way you are, Rin...
I don't get half the things you say, Ringo, but they sound really smart.
Wait a second... Is ~name~ not into guys at all...? Aw...
You're a princess, ~name~? My wife, Riche, is a princess too!
You seem like the questing type, ~name~. I wonder what your level is.
I'm no hanny, ~name~, but those glasses are really cute.
It kind of feels a bit wrong to make someone like that strip...
I'm sorry for being a bit excited, ~name~. Take your time.
She has to...? {loud}This is the greatest game ever made!{!reset}
Oh no, whatever will ~name~ do now?
Time to undress, ma'am.
Sometimes life is just good.
Ah, ~name~... I'm glad.
~Name~! Quick! You have to get naked! It's important!
Don't worry, ~name~! I've seen lots of naked girls before!
Oh, hey, my numbers were better than yours! Nice!
Eheh. Lucky.
I always love seeing girls undress in front of me.
Yes! Join me, ~name~! Being naked is great!
Did I distract you more than you distracted me?
Aww, you lost? I'm sorry.
Naked is the new clothed!
Hell yes! With someone as hot as ~name~ stripping, I'll be done in no time!
Am I glad to see you lose, ~name~. Really, really glad.
~Name~, excuse me, but could you show me your butt? Please?
I already came, but I can go again just for you, ~name~!
Hah. And you guys are still going. Don't mind me, then.
Losing is all bad, ~name~.
Even if I'm done jerking off for now, I'm glad to see you lose more!
Dodged!
Ahh... Ramius's boobs are always so soft. Burying my face in them is so nice.
Mmh... Kath is such a dork... it's so cute...
Riche is always so refined... so whenever we fuck, it's like she's a totally different person...
Tio's like the whole package... boobs, ass, legs... everything...!
I know! I'll just stare at ~fem~ while ~name~ strips! it's the only way!
Not like he's taking off anything exciting, anyway.
I'll be over here thinking about boobs while you do all that.
What stats ~clothing.ifPlural(do|does)~ the ~clothing~ have?
I wonder, if I had a gal monster equipped, would I have to strip her, too?
I think I saw something like that back at the shop in Stallion. It looked kind of cheap, though.
...I feel like I've miscalculated somewhere.
Oh. Right, you still have that. Fair enough.
Damn you! You're too good at this dumb game!
Well, this is just awkward.
You could be a little more considerate for the plight of your common man.
That's weak, ~name~! If it comes to that, I'm not even counting my tie as clothing!

Hey! I didn't even count my tie as a layer!
...I probably should have, though.
Can we go back to the part where girls get naked, now?
Are you done yet? Because I'm not.
The only accessories I wound up using were my sisters' plates. Honestly, they're way too strong.
I was going to say something, but I forgot what it was. Must not have been important, so let's keep playing!
This game is gonna take a while.
Toss a guy a bone, will ya? Ah, not in that way, though!
You must be hiding something if you're taking it so slowly. I'm watching you.
Hmph. You can't keep going with small stuff forever.
You need bravado if you want to impress girls. There's no other way.
If you keep chickening out, you'll never get married, ~name~.
Aw, come on! I'm here with my dick out, you could at least show something!
Ah, I got lost in thought. You guys still going?
Damn it, ~name~! You're still in this dumb game?
Uh, wait, what were we doing again?
That bag... hey, are you a tactician?
Oh, so ~clothing~ first, then what? ...Or is that it?
Your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ very cute, ~name~.
I'm gonna look away, and when I look back, you'll be naked, right?
~Clothing~. Man's greatest foe.
That's kinda cruel, but I guess I deserve it.
I look like a fool now, don't I?
That's fine! I can jerk off while I look at your face just as well!
Shy girls turn me on, too.
I don't mind you being coy, ~name~. It's endearing!
Aw. You could've kept that on until the end.
Why not leave that on? You don't have to take every little thing off.
It's just that Kath carries all kinds of useful stuff in her bag... whenever we don't just have Ramius carry everything.
I was hoping to see all of you, but there's still time, right?
I should get some accessories for Riche while I m in this world. Maybe she'd forgive me for playing this game, then.
You'd look cuter wearing less, though.
Aw, come on! You're super hot! You should want the world to see it!
I might cry, you know.
Aw, I can't get mad. You're too cute for that.
Am I playing this game wrong, somehow?
I don't get it. If I show you my dick, you should show me your boobs. Right?
I'd like it if you showed more soon, though. It'd help... a lot.
Could you lose a bit more, though? Pretty please?
But if you prefer it slow, that's fine. I'm not upset. At all.
Or you can take it off now, I guess.
No shame in taking some damage early on.
Could be worse. Could be a lot worse.
Is that it? You can do better, ~name~.
I used to wear fancier armor myself, but it wasn't really my style.
I guess wearing more helps you stay warm. I don't get cold easily, though.
Am I just bad at this?
I've never been good at cards.
Thanks for not being weird, ~name~.
Good man, ~name~.
Man up, ~name~! You can't keep losing like that!

Don't lose again, ~name~!
I don't want to see you naked.
If you're timid, that's fine. Not like I mind.
I'm... kind of glad none of the guys from Eden are here. They'd be way too eager about this.
Thinking about it, it's strange how people in Lancelot seem to dress up as much as people in Central. The climate was totally different.
No huge loss, i guess. It does feel like the game has lost some momentum, though...
Y'know, maybe if you were more bold, you'd have more wives. So there.
Wait, did I make it weird by pointing it out...?
Ah, I ruined it by drawing attention to it. Now it's weird again.
Sakura...? I can't tell what you're... taking... off...?
I'd probably take the front, then it depends on what level he is. If it's just one outlaw, he should go down with one power slash, though.
I guess some girls like to dress up more than others.
I didn't mind the ~clothing~. I don't mind ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~ coming off, either.
Lots of layers can help you stay warm. Ramius is just naturally warm, though, so we just stuck close to her when we went further North.
Would Towa like ~clothing.ifPlural(|a)~ like that...? It's been a while since I gifted her anything.
You can always take two things off but count it as one, ~name~.
Is that expensive? I rarely buy clothes, except for armor.
Maybe I should invest in a new outfit. This one as been getting old...
Only the ~clothing~? Aw. That's a shame.
Really? is that gonna be it? Damn.
That's good enough for me, ~name~.
That's not a huge help, but it's not like I need much help anyway.
Heh. You're just letting my imagination do the work instead.
I don't always need to look at boobs to fap.

state.text: You're a zombie? I, uh.. that's... bringing back memories.

case.state: If you get cold, you can always huddle for warmth with me.
If it gets chilly, I can lend you my jacket.
You might be even cuter without that, anyway.
Ah. Girls are so nice.
Shopping for clothes is nice when you have a cute girl with you.
Ah, i went off-track. Looking great, ~name~.
Wanna head to a shop after the game? My treat.
I'll just have to keep encouraging you to take off more!
You still look great, so I'm not gonna complain.
But don't you want to show off a little bit more? Just a bit?
You have... pretty eyes, by the way...
That coyness... is so good!
Sometimes, a cute face is enough!
Am I secretly that good at this game?
I... wasn't expecting to be that good.
Did I zone out? how are you already taking off your ~clothing~?
I'm in absolutely no position to judge, am I?
Well, when my own pants are off...
Guess we're going to be even soon.
Egh... Good enough.
No room to complain, but you do see the state I'm in.
Eesh, this is weird.
Not a fan of this.
Ah, boy. That's awkward.
I'm not doing this on purpose! I swear!
It's not my fault you're bad at the game!
You can blame the dealer, not me!
But if that's how it'll be, then you'll be the one getting naked!
But both of us getting naked is where I draw the line!
I don't want to see you naked... so play better!
Refreshing to see I'm not the only one in trouble, at least.
You might just be joining me soon. Ah, you know what I mean!
I'll just go back to fantasizing, now.
I'll go ahead and retreat back into my mind.
I can always pretend a hot girl is getting naked instead...
More clothes coming off... magnificent.
Seriously? That much? Nice!
Nice!
Did I inspire you to do that?
I'm so glad to be here today.
That's not so bad, is it?
Your ~clothing~ really ~clothing.ifPlural(have|has)~ to go, huh?
Yay!
Hah... ~name~... you're...
Really? You're taking off...
For me? Th-thanks!
I really like girls.
You actually do look better like that.
Yeah, that... that's a good look.
Say, if I went nude, would you keep matching my pace?
Maybe I should keep enticing you to go even further...
Hah. Don't worry, Ramius shows more skin than that all the time.
Totally hot!
And with that gone, the world is a happier place for everyone!
Can you tell I love that look?
So close to perfection, now.
F-fuck, that is sexy!
M-mesmerizing...
Such a nice body...
Hngh... I wanna touch you...
What's the big deal? You don't have boobs.
No biggie. I've seen a lot of male chests before.
Well? Let's see what you got, ~name~.
Hm? Want to compete with me, ~name~? Bring it on!
Your ~clothing~? I wonder how we square up, body-wise.
Your ~clothing~... (I kind of hope he isn't more fit than I am.)
...Ah. You're pretty... chestful.
Yeah, you're muscular. Not the most muscular dude I've met, though.
Yeah, well, you need more than muscle in a fight.
I'm... more about stamina than raw strength, anyway.
...Alright! I'm not losing out here! I'm gonna get naked and show you I'm no less athletic than you are!
This is a challenge! I need to show off my own body to match!
Hey, I'm totally more fit than that! Right? ~Player~, you can confirm that!
Damn it! I can't tell which one of us is more athletic!
I take it you're not a fighter, ~name~? You'd need a bit more muscle for that.
You could get more toned with some effort.
Hey, you don't look too bad.
Want to train together sometime? You could grow some muscle.
I wish you had boobs. You'd look better if you did.
Well, that didn't make this any less uncomfortable.
I get being eager to show off, but have some decency!
It's a bit early for that, isn't it?!
I guess I don't have room to judge when my pants are already off.
Oh. You're... doing that, now.
You better not suggest comparing sizes.
Whatever you have down there, we're not comparing. Deal?
Really? Now? Right in front of my penis?
That is some unfortunate timing.
Well, at least that's not very impactful.
Oh, guess it s no big deal, anyway.
(I should try and keep my boxers on to not embarrass him.)
Hey, we should keep playing! Y'know, no reason to get hung up on one round.
...I'm not saying anything.
Heh.
Actually, that gives me some confidence. Thanks!
(Why did I just... think of that as `cute'?)
Other guys' dicks look weird.
I've seen more dicks in my life than I've ever wanted to.
Yeah, that's a dick. We've all seen those. Probably.
I... hope that's nobody's first time seeing a dick around here.
Mine... is bigger, though, right.
On second thought, we can definitely compare.
You took me right out of my groove.
Aw, man. that ruined my rhythm.
Hold on! Don't go swinging that around like you own the place! I'm gonna join you, soon enough!
Hey! That's not that impressive! And I'll prove it!
Is this a challenge? Just you wait until my pants come off!
That's it! This is now a war!
Wait, mine's bigger, right? ~Player~, tell him!
Hold on! Mine is definitely bigger! ...Right?
What the hell!? That's not fair!
(And suddenly, I'm glad my wives aren't here.)
Boobs... are a man's reason to live!
Words cannot express how excited I am!
Your boobs... {loud}we need to see them!{!reset}
The image of your boobs has been in my mind since I got here! I need to see them for real!
{loud}Show me your boobs!{!reset}
In this world, where any day can be your last, the one thing that drives us all forward... it's boobs!
~Name~... show them to me! Please!
I {loud}implore{!reset} you, ~name~! Let me see your boobs!
Those are way smaller than Gurigura's... I want to touch them!
